item.description:
New York Buddhist Church & Rubin Museum Field Trip. Leaving: Wethersfield @ 8:15 a.m. English service: 11:30 – 12:30 p.m. followed by lunch in the City. Dharma Talk topic: “Life in this Human Form.” Location: 331-332 Riverside Drive, Manhattan. Then, a visit to Rubin Museum of Art to look at NYC’s most comprehensive collection of Himalayan (Buddhist) Art. We’ll have lunch in NYC.

Buddhist Church http://www.newyorkbud...

Rubin Museum http://www.rmanyc.org...

CARPOOLING: from Wethersfield (e-mail us for address) & we need 2 volunteers to drive (gas & parking expenses will be shared)

TIME: meeting up @ 8:00 a.m. leaving @ 8:15 a.m. sharp.

RSVP: it’s necessary for that we know who is going and volunteering, by Friday, 7/24



Our regular Sunday morning gatherings are on recess from 7/19 - 9/12.

Please review our full and complete Buddhist Summer 2009 talks, gatherings, field trips, activities and retreats on our web site.

See our CALENDAR @

www.bffct.net
item.how_to_find_us: Mansfield Freeman Center is towards the end of the road next to cementary.

group.name: Buddhist Faith Fellowship in Middletown, Ct

item.name: New York Buddhist Church & Rubin Museum Field Trip
